title: "Version History"

This page documents how the Nested RF Protocols have evolved over time. 

Parameters that **changed from the preceding version** are shown in **bold**.

::: {.callout-important}
#### Key Protocol 1 Changes Over Time

1. **Dec 2024:** Changed from 20kHz to 10kHz sampling rate
2. **Apr 2025:** Switched from LHS to RHS for DS Probe experiments
3. **Jul 2025:** Increased inter-flash interval from 50ms to 150ms; changed background from 6/15 to 4/15
4. **Nov 2025:** Removed 12px flashes for pharmacology experiments (6px only)
:::

::: {.callout-important}
### Bar stimulus fix (2025-10-15)
Remade patterns 0015 and 0016 (full field bar stimuli — dark bars at 6/8&pi; and 7/8&pi;) so that their "normal" and "flipped" directions match the sequence of the other bar orientations. Before they were moving from west to east, now changed to east to west. This change was made in commit [82badc7](https://github.com/leburnett/nested_RF_stimulus/commit/82badc7c0f12916d037b11a98a3e712ef3c9322c), so all `T4T5 MARCM Autumn2025` data will be consistent and data in `T4T5 MARCM Summer2025` will have the original bar stimuli.
:::

::: {.callout-important}
### Pharmacology: "Dummy" sweep added (2025-11-20)
At the beginning of each repetition, the slowest speed starts with one additional right-to-left sweep. This is then followed by the normal order of sweeps (left to right, then right to left). This extra sweep happens only for the slowest speed, at the beginning of each rep.
:::

::: {.callout-important}
#### Key Protocol 2 Changes Over Time

1. **May 6th 2025:** Added 10s background intervals between repetitions and at the start of the protocol.
2. **July 2025:** Changed the background intensity from 6/15 to 4/15.
3. **Oct 2025:** Added 168 dps sweeps and bar flashes (80ms and 14ms) to the protocol.
4. **Oct 2025:** Introduced a 3s background interval between stimulus blocks for easier data parsing.
5. **Oct 23rd 2025:** Changed bar flash position spacing from 1px to 2px increments.
6. **Nov 2025:** Removed square flashes for pharmacology experiments, focusing solely on bar sweeps and flashes. Added 2 faster speeds.
:::

::: {.callout-note}
### How to verify the version if unsure
For definitive confirmation, check the metadata within the `.mat` saved within the `params` folder and the `currentExp.mat` file within the experiment folder, which contain the exact parameters used. The exact pattern and position functions used are saved within the experiment folder too.
:::
